title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4203.2 - Temporary employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4203.2 - Temporary employees

State Regulations

The chairman may arrange for the employment of such
temporary employees for such period as he may deem necessary, within the lawful
appropriation therefor, upon approval by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4203.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
